data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Shimeng, Wang, Zhaohong, Li, Yajin, Mound, Laurence (2018): One new species, two generic synonyms and eight new records of Thripidae from China (Thysanoptera). Zootaxa 4418 (4): 370-378, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4418.4.3|12 occurrences
